Action.author: ignisvulpis
Action.body: ) + Send>)` is now named BoxedCallbackStringStringSend. This is part of this PR https://github.com/hyperledger/indy-sdk/pull/1827 I did not address the other warnings because this clippy issue is about readability which is not really an issue in general. We would have to define a type for each callback, that is for every combination of results. This would reduce readability, I think. We could address the warning be adding `# warn(clippy::type_complexity) ` https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy#allowingdenying-lints >
